tool_description: Analyzes applicable environmental regulations and compliance requirements for mining operations based on jurisdiction and mining type.

country.description: Country where the mining operation is located

state_province.description: State or province within the country

mining_type.description: Type of mining operation (coal, gold, copper, iron_ore, limestone, etc.)

operation_scale.description: Scale of operation (small, medium, large, mega)

error_messages: Unsupported jurisdiction: The specified country or state/province is not supported.
Invalid mining type: Use supported mining types like coal, gold, copper, iron_ore, limestone.
Invalid operation scale: Use one of small, medium, large, or mega.
Invalid mining method: Use surface, underground, or both.
usage: Specify the country, state/province, mining type, and operation scale to get applicable regulatory requirements and compliance standards.
